dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description:
The Java Development Kit (JDK) released by Oracle Corporation in the
form of a binary product aimed at Java developers. Includes a complete
JRE plus tools for developing, debugging, and monitoring Java
applications.

dependencies.name: ant
dependencies.description:
Apache Ant is a Java library and command-line tool whose mission is to
drive processes described in build files as targets and extension points
dependent upon each other

dependencies.name: zsh
dependencies.description:
Zsh is a shell designed for interactive use, although it is also a
powerful scripting language. Many of the useful features of bash, ksh,
and tcsh were incorporated into zsh; many original features were added.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependent_to.name: savanna
dependent_to.description:
CODARcode Savanna runtime framework for high performance, workflow
management using Swift/T and ADIOS.

dependent_to.name: mpix-launch-swift
dependent_to.description:
Library that allows a child MPI application to be launched inside a
subset of processes in a parent MPI application.
